mapper.select: SELECT p.* FROM sys_user AS u LEFT JOIN sys_user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role AS r ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission AS rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission AS p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.id = #{userId}
select * from sys_permission where type = 2 and path = #{requestUrl}
